channel.title: [317] delta need help with gambling
channel.description: hey guys i cant seem to find a tutorial or someone to help me. i need to make it so they talk to a npc and go thro options such as bet 50m 10m and stuff like that then it generates a random number and if they win it gives them the cash. or i want to add a dice bag but i dont think i can do that with a 317. please can anyone help me if so leave a comment thank you all love you peace!

If you need help feel free to PM me, because it probably wont be easy.
Then you need to add in the things like if(bet10){
c.getitem(995,100000000);
